Description: Replay Guitar Exchange is proud to offer this perfectly preserved American-made Gibson Les Paul Classic from the year 2013, and with a heartwarming Cherry Sunburst finish and a cream pickguard. This guitar was beautifully crafted with a stunning flame maple top attached to a mahogany body with a distinct cream binding, as well as a smooth mahogany neck hosting an easily playable rosewood fingerboard. Zebra-coil humbuckers emit a beastly tone, controlled by a pair of push/push boost and coil tap control knobs. This guitar is in Near Mint condition, with no issues to specifically point out, and an estimated 95% of fret life remaining. Gibson Les Paul Classics are some of the mightiest instruments in the world, and this 2013 model is certainly no exception - try this guitar out at Replay Guitar Exchange today! As always, feel free to contact our store for more details, or with any questions. Weight: 9 lbs. 2 oz. Neck material: mahogany Scale length: 24.75" Nut width: 1.684" Fingerboard radius: 12" Neck shape: D Fingerboard material: rosewood Frets: 11, medium jumbo Country of origin: USA Hard shell case included Listing and template services provided by inkFrog
Title: Used 2013 Gibson USA Les Paul Classic, Cherry Sunburst
